title: Vitaler Hirsch
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Beer/Wine, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Set in an idyllic village outside of Crimmitschau, this hotel restaurant offers a separate vegetarian menu with several vegan and raw dishes; has salads, mains, daily special, soup, and sorbet. The atmosphere is quaint and relaxed. Reservations are suggested on weekends. Holds a monthly vegan gathering with lectures on various health and food related topics.
